The following full scene kisekae codes were imported with the Character Editor using KKL v54. To widen the image, the left side was set to -99 and the right side was set to 601.
The ice block effect and pose here were both done by UnderscorM3.

The stage 0 pose here is unused, but has all of Mei's clothing on for possible use in an unknown future.
